mapper.select: select * , r.id as status from board c inner join user u on c.user_id = u.id left join reply r on r.board_id = c.id where code = #{code} order by c.id desc LIMIT #{start}, 5
mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, product_id, code, title, content, secret) values(#{userId}, #{productId},#{code},#{title}, #{content}, #{secret});
